interactivity.requirements: 30 Haruka Affection Choose to pursue Haruka during either Invisible Worm or Roses You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Conflict of Interest " from Haruka Hamasaki
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Call Haruka during the night after all Requirements have been fulfilled.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose not to pursue Haruka during both Invisible Worm and Roses . Replaced by Soap .

progression.synopsis: Sensei calls Haruka to hang out. After a bit of time together, the two discuss the future of both their relationship and Haruka's marriage.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.32.
